item.title: Record Bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Joined to grief the same structures on Creative lava+water
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=565340
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=565371

Banned Time Served tinytutman for 1week for stealing from my farm and not replanting and griefing rels ufo http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,546511.msg4006610.html

Banned sylux184 permanently for griefing purposely. http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,546818.0.html

Banned ProAwesome1 for undetermined time for repeatedly griefing spawn area.

Banned fssqurl for griefing http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,547508.msg4015253.html#new

Banned csmack http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=565426 for griefing w1 spawn.

Banned aren81 for griefing my place in w2 and not responding to my attempt to chat with him. http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=568126

Banned cedrick213 http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=567882 for griefing my place in w2.

Banned tankofawsome0009 http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=566439 griefing spawns repeatedly.

item.title: Record Bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Banned: Stefaan
Time: 2 Months
Reason: Did a considerable amount of damage in creative using lava, obviously joined just to grief.
Notes: _

Banned: thatguy11223
Time: 2 months
Reason: Same as above ^
Notes: _

Banned: moosycat
Time: 2 weeks
Reason: Was sent this screenshot, apparently he had been spamming for a while.

Gyazo

Gyazo

​

Asked him why he was spamming, no response then he proceeded to do it again. Muted him and he logged in with a few innapropriate names before logging back into his account. Unmuted him and asked if he had anything to say for himself and he continued spamming. Banned for two weeks.
Notes: Have a few more screenshots if necessary.

Banned: lucNL
Time: Indefinitely
Reason: Major [C] grief
Notes: This is getting rediculous

Banned: mohamed3499
Time: 1 Week
Reason: http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,545669.0.html
Notes: _

Read full topic

item.title: Record Bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:57, topic:394732”]Wait, what…

I wasn’t aware of that, in that case ignore a large proportion of what I just said.[/quote]
I’m positive I posted the update somewhere.

edit:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:706, topic:383844”]I’ve made some changes to what you need to do to login to the server. The login script will still prefer your minecraft name set under your profile, but if that isn’t set, you can also use your actual forum name. That is assuming, of course, that your forum name only contains characters allowed in minecraft, if not, set your name as usual.

This will hopefully make it easier for new people to join if they don’t set their minecraft name. :)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Record Bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The only member that comes up with anything relating to the above is this:

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=563774

He doesn’t have any MC username, I’ve also checked his profile edits and he never had a mc username there. The next time he logs on do /whois username and get his IP, then ask a forum staff member to check it

Most people use hide their real IP for the forums, but fail to do so ingame.

The current IP of the forum account is: 86.137.92.155

Also, it’s usually a good idea to add a ban length as well

@Moparisthebest: Perhaps I can’t see MC name edits? Seems weird it isn’t showing up.

Read full topic

I did, just notified him of what he had done and to read the rules before he does something else wrong

[s]Angryolly: griefing and cheating to find our end base, also seems like a ban evasion account(ip check please?), Action: Ban

Was playing Friday Morning (March 30th) went afk and when I came back I saw this.

2jUPY.png1680×988

Did he find a way around or does the ban just not let them log in.

item.title: Record Bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Well it was a weekish for the cheating, that doesn’t count ignoring my warning about helping people ban evade. The situation is complicated and I just don’t have enough time right now to get on and walk back over there to check out everything but I will do it later on today (currently 7:35AM).

I plan on making a clear example out of their leader, Nokturth, they seem to think they can get away with whatever they want because they work in a team of 6 or more. I went through a lot of trouble catching these people out because he lied through his teeth to me on more than three occasions.

Read full topic

in his post he noted “weekish(?)”

so i guess a week?

item.title: Record Bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:40, topic:394732”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=491916.msg3944973#msg3944973 date=1331770452]

Here are the IPs that people log onto the server with, from the same time frame as the stats list, and updated at the same time as the stats list every night:

http://www.moparcraft.net/worldmap/45edi54uid.log

As with the stats list, remember to press F5 (to force a refresh) once a day as well so you are sure you have the latest version.

I hope that is easy enough to search through and solves any problems you guys might have. Let me know.
[/quote]This will be useful. Just keep in mind sometimes we log in with others names so we can ban them while their offline.

But you don’t do that anymore now that you can add them to the banned usergroup on the forums right?[/quote]Right, there is no reason to do that anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Record Bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:

[quote=“zuppers, post:39, topic:394732”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=491916.msg3944922#msg3944922 date=1331768835]
Here are the IPs that people log onto the server with, from the same time frame as the stats list, and updated at the same time as the stats list every night:

http://www.moparcraft.net/worldmap/45edi54uid.log

As with the stats list, remember to press F5 (to force a refresh) once a day as well so you are sure you have the latest version.

I hope that is easy enough to search through and solves any problems you guys might have. Let me know.
[/quote]This will be useful. Just keep in mind sometimes we log in with others names so we can ban them while their offline.[/quote]
But you don’t do that anymore now that you can add them to the banned usergroup on the forums right?

Read full topic
